CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 16, reads: "WHAT HOME SERVICE FAIR CROWDS SAW...Tuesday's Home Service Fair show as it looked from the rear of the auditorium"
TitMainTitle: Audience seated before stage with Pepsi-Cola display, Crosley Appliances, and sign for Gem razors, in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
